name: Super Nova GGJ 2021
description:
This is our entry for GGJ 2021. It was a 48 hour jam with the theme "Lost & Found". The actual work done was only about 8 hours or so.
You're an explorer that found a long lost relic, but it turns out, it was evil and very... round. It was a big black bad ball.
I did all the coding involved from scratch, the game design and sounds were done by team members.

I used Unity's animation rigging to create worm like creatures, their worm like nature isn't really showing in the game as I hoped it would xD.

Anyway, was a fun project.

Controls:

Left-Shift: Speed Boost

Hold Space: Shoot

WASD: Fly!

Credits:
